cause.description:
spending a large majority of my childhood here, I vowed one day to contribute to he happiness of the children here. either by donating time or whatever amount of funding I can provide. won't you help me - help them?
1. donating time to do volunteer work with children
2. donating children's books and toys
3. donating any funds for the children
cause.mission: To bring happiness to the children
cause.name: Children's Hospital of Milwaukee
